short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download web images with added prefixes or suffixes for categorization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Set up keys and the designated prefixes or suffixes that will be appended to the images names.
2. Hover over the photos you want to download, and press one of the assigned keys
3. Enjoy

(works better if chrome is setup to auto-save files without a confirmation prompt)
